message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product! I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that.
I'm getting close, but I still think I can do a bit better. How about $78? That's my final offer.
I think we're really close now! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product.
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about $79? That's my absolute limit.
I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I think we've had a good negotiation, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm sticking with my previous offer.
